column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Be prepared to yell because the noise level of the back room is off the scale.  Only 2 tables empty so it was pretty full and the low ceilings provided awful acoustics.  Otherwise
column3: a little on the bright side
column4: and lots of sports jerseys framed on the wall.  2 TVs straddle the corners of the room keeping a watchful eye on the diners.
